name: hospital-information-system
description: Hospital Information System (HIS) with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
